item.title: The cracks in the edifice.
item.description: Source: here. In 1326 the Army of Islam had completed the conquest of Hind and almost all of the old Hindu dynasties from the royal shishodias and ChAhamAnas in the north, the yAdavas and hoyasalas of Middle India and the Cholas and Pandyas of South India lay prostrate before the cresent banner. The great edifice of India, starting from the kuru and the pA~nchAla, through the mauryans, shungas, guptas and their successor states was destroyed.
